Accept LifeHotel About Us Rooms Event Contact Welcome To Life Hotel | About Us We are at your service for a unique holiday. Spacious & Highly Comfortable Hotel Higly Comfortable Stay in sustainable style, discover custom-designed furnishings, commissioned art and innovative design in every corner of our hotel. Savor fresh European flavors with creekside dining and an energetic bar with craft cocktails. Unwind in modern loft-like guestrooms and many gathering spaces. At Life Hotel you are getting premier service and beautiful rooms with many additional services and options. See More Discover Hotel facilities & services Wifi Connection You will enjoy the comfort in our most luxurious and comfortable rooms. Unlimited Service You can benefit from 24-hour hot water and minibar. Immaculate Rooms Daily cleaned towels and all your bathroom needs are available. Swimming Pool Dive into relaxation in our pristine, temperature-controlled swimming pool. Fitness Center Achieve your fitness goals with state-of-the-art equipment. Spa and Wellness Experience ultimate relaxation and rejuvenation with our luxurious. Executive Room Wonderful powder room in victorian style, from the beautiful colors, to wallpapers and border patterns, to little cherub on the sink, and gas fireplace perfect for those cooler evenings. See More About Us Our Mission: At LifeHotel, our mission is to provide a home away from home, offering luxurious accommodations, personalized service, and unforgettable experiences. We strive to create a welcoming environment where guests can relax, rejuvenate, and make lasting memories. Our History: LifeHotel was established in 2007 with the vision of redefining hospitality. With a rich history of excellence and innovation, we have grown into a premier destination for travelers seeking comfort, style, and exceptional service. Our Amenities: We offer an array of top-notch amenities including a state-of-the-art fitness center, a serene spa and wellness center, a rooftop swimming pool with stunning views, gourmet dining options, and well-equipped business facilities. Sustainability Commitment: LifeHotel is committed to sustainability and eco-friendly practices. We implement energy-efficient technologies, reduce waste through recycling programs, and support local communities to ensure a positive impact on the environment. Our Team: Our team of dedicated professionals is passionate about hospitality and committed to exceeding guest expectations. From the moment you arrive, our staff is here to provide personalized service and ensure your stay is as comfortable and enjoyable as possible. Our Rooms Contact Us LifeHotel Pages About Us Rooms Event Contact Us Privacy Policy Terms of Use Disclaimer Contact Kodomal, Chhattisgarh, India LifeHotel@gmail.com (33) 457-95-10 Copyright © 2024. Accept LifeHotel About Us Rooms Event Contact Welcome To Life Hotel | Contact We are at your service for a unique holiday. CONTACT Telephone (33) 457-95-10 E-mail LifeHotel@gmail.com Maps Kodomal, Chhattisgarh, India Do you have a question? Whether you have inquiries about our accommodations, facilities, or services, our dedicated team is ready to provide you with the information you need. Feel free to reach out to us with any questions or concerns you may have, and we'll ensure you have a seamless and enjoyable experience during your stay with us - FAQ Discover Hotel facilities & services Wifi Connection You will enjoy the comfort in our most luxurious and comfortable rooms. Unlimited Service You can benefit from 24-hour hot water and minibar. Immaculate Rooms Daily cleaned towels and all your bathroom needs are available. Swimming Pool Dive into relaxation in our pristine, temperature-controlled swimming pool. Fitness Center Achieve your fitness goals with state-of-the-art equipment. Spa and Wellness Experience ultimate relaxation and rejuvenation with our luxurious. Frequently Asked Questions What time is check-in and check-out? Check-in is from 3:00 PM, and check-out is by 11:00 AM. If you need an early check-in or late check-out, please contact the front desk, and we will do our best to accommodate your request based on availability. Is breakfast included in the room rate? Yes, a complimentary breakfast buffet is included with your stay. Served daily from 6:30 AM to 10:30 AM in our dining area, it features a variety of hot and cold options to suit all tastes. Do you offer airport shuttle service? Yes, we provide a complimentary airport shuttle service for our guests. Please provide your flight details at least 24 hours in advance to arrange your pickup and drop-off. Is Wi-Fi available throughout the hotel? Yes, high-speed Wi-Fi is available throughout the hotel, including in guest rooms and common areas. Access is complimentary for all guests. Are pets allowed in the hotel? Yes, we are a pet-friendly hotel. We welcome pets up to 25 pounds with a small additional cleaning fee. Please inform us in advance if you are bringing a pet to ensure a comfortable stay for all guests. Do you have facilities for disabled guests? Yes, LifeHotel is fully accessible and equipped with facilities for disabled guests. This includes accessible rooms, elevators, and public areas. Please let us know your specific needs when booking. Our Rooms Contact Us LifeHotel Pages About Us Rooms Event Contact Us Privacy Policy Terms of Use Disclaimer Contact Kodomal, Chhattisgarh, India LifeHotel@gmail.com (33) 457-95-10 Copyright © 2024. All rights reserved.

pages.event: Host Memorable Events at LifeHotel - Premier Venue in India Dear visitors to our site! At LifeHotel, we utilize cookies on our website to enhance our services and improve user experience, providing a personalized service. We prioritize user trust and ensure that their information is handled securely and confidentially. By using our website, you agree to accept our Privacy Policy. Accept LifeHotel About Us Rooms Event Contact Welcome To Life Hotel | Event We are at your service for a unique holiday. Our Events Asian cuisine 24/04/2024 Delicious food 22/06/2024 Tennis & Fitnes 12/05/2024 Golf retreat 20/09/2024 Explore nature & resort 3/06/2024 Wellness lake & comfort 12/08/2024 Contact Discover Hotel facilities & services Wifi Connection You will enjoy the comfort in our most luxurious and comfortable rooms. Unlimited Service You can benefit from 24-hour hot water and minibar. Immaculate Rooms Daily cleaned towels and all your bathroom needs are available. Swimming Pool Dive into relaxation in our pristine, temperature-controlled swimming pool. Fitness Center Achieve your fitness goals with state-of-the-art equipment. Spa and Wellness Experience ultimate relaxation and rejuvenation with our luxurious. We have weekly events In Our Hotel Live Music Nights Unwind with live music at LifeHotel's weekly Live Music Nights. Experience talented local musicians performing a variety of genres, creating the perfect ambiance for a relaxing evening with friends and family. Culinary Masterclasses Delve into the world of culinary arts with our interactive Culinary Masterclasses. Join renowned chefs as they share their expertise in preparing signature dishes and learn insider tips to elevate your cooking skills. Outdoor Movie Screenings Experience movie magic under the stars at LifeHotel's Outdoor Movie Screenings. Cozy up with blankets and popcorn as we feature classic films and family favorites in our picturesque outdoor setting. Art Exhibitions Immerse yourself in creativity at LifeHotel's Art Exhibitions. Discover a showcase of local artists' works, ranging from paintings to sculptures, providing a cultural backdrop to your stay and an opportunity to support the arts community. Local Art Exhibitions Celebrate creativity and culture with our rotating art exhibitions featuring works by local artists. Explore a diverse range of artistic styles and mediums, from paintings and sculptures to photography and mixed media installations. Sports Tennis Court Access Experience the thrill of a game on our state-of-the-art tennis courts. Whether you're a seasoned player or a beginner, enjoy top-notch facilities and equipment to perfect your serve and volley. Book a private lesson with our professional coaches or join a friendly match with fellow guests. Yoga Classes Find your inner peace and improve flexibility with our daily yoga classes. Suitable for all levels, our experienced instructors guide you through various poses and breathing techniques in a serene setting, helping you achieve balance and relaxation. Golf Packages Tee off at nearby championship golf courses with our exclusive Golf Packages. Enjoy preferential tee times, complimentary transfers, and tailored lessons to improve your swing. Perfect for golf enthusiasts looking to enjoy a luxurious game amidst beautiful landscapes. Swimming Pool Dive into our crystal-clear swimming pool for a refreshing swim or a leisurely dip. With dedicated lanes for serious swimmers and a shallow end for relaxation, our pool caters to all needs. Enjoy poolside service with refreshing drinks and snacks. Fitness Center Stay in shape at our fully equipped Fitness Center. Featuring the latest cardio and strength training equipment, you can maintain your fitness routine or start a new one. Personal trainers are available for tailored workouts and fitness advice. Bike Rentals Explore the beautiful surroundings on two wheels with our Bike Rentals. Choose from a variety of bikes suitable for different terrains and enjoy scenic rides along dedicated bike paths. Helmets and safety gear are provided for your convenience and safety. pages.policy: Privacy Policy | LifeHotel - Your Privacy Matters to Us Dear visitors to our site! At LifeHotel, we utilize cookies on our website to enhance our services and improve user experience, providing a personalized service. We prioritize user trust and ensure that their information is handled securely and confidentially. By using our website, you agree to accept our Privacy Policy. Accept LifeHotel About Us Rooms Event Contact Welcome To Life Hotel | Privacy Policy We are at your service for a unique holiday. Privacy Policy for LifeHotel Welcome to the LifeHotel website. We respect your privacy and are committed to protecting your personal data. This Privacy Policy explains how we handle and use your personal data when you visit our website, or when you use our services. Data Collection When you visit our website, we may collect certain data about your device, including your IP address, device type, browser type, and operating system. We may also collect information about your online behavior, such as the pages you visit and the links you click on. Cookies and Tracking Technologies We use cookies and other tracking technologies to improve your experience on our website and to personalize our services. Cookies are small text files that are stored on your device when you visit our website. You can control the use of cookies through your browser settings. Information Distribution Policies We are firmly against the sale, trade, or improper sharing of your personally identifiable information with external parties, except under certain conditions. Use of Personal Data We use your personal data to provide and improve our services, to communicate with you, and to send you marketing communications. We may also use your personal data to comply with legal obligations, to detect and prevent fraud, and to protect the security of our website and our users. Sharing of Personal Data We may share your personal data with third-party service providers who perform services on our behalf, such as hosting providers, payment processors, and marketing agencies. We may also share your personal data with law enforcement agencies, government authorities, or other third parties as required by law. Data Retention We retain your personal data for as long as necessary to fulfill the purposes for which we collected it, including for the purposes of satisfying any legal, accounting, or reporting requirements. Data Security We are committed to ensuring the security of your personal data. We have implemented appropriate physical, technical, and organizational measures to protect your personal data from unauthorized access, use, or disclosure. Your Rights You have certain rights with respect to your personal data, including the right to access, correct, or delete your personal data. You may also have the right to object to or restrict certain types of data processing. If you have any questions or concerns about this Privacy Policy, please contact us at LifeHotel@gmail.com LifeHotel Pages About Us Rooms Event Contact Us Privacy Policy Terms of Use Disclaimer Contact Kodomal, Chhattisgarh, India LifeHotel@gmail.com (33) 457-95-10 Copyright © 2024. All rights reserved.
pages.rooms: Luxurious Hotel Rooms at LifeHotel - Unmatched Comfort and Elegance Dear visitors to our site! At LifeHotel, we utilize cookies on our website to enhance our services and improve user experience, providing a personalized service. We prioritize user trust and ensure that their information is handled securely and confidentially. By using our website, you agree to accept our Privacy Policy. Accept LifeHotel About Us Rooms Event Contact Welcome To Life Hotel | Rooms We are at your service for a unique holiday. Our Rooms Restfulness room Comfort Premium room Comfort + style Meditation room Comfort Restfulness room Relax Tranquil room Relax Comfort room Relax Discover Hotel facilities & services Wifi Connection You will enjoy the comfort in our most luxurious and comfortable rooms. Unlimited Service You can benefit from 24-hour hot water and minibar. Immaculate Rooms Daily cleaned towels and all your bathroom needs are available. Swimming Pool Dive into relaxation in our pristine, temperature-controlled swimming pool. Fitness Center Achieve your fitness goals with state-of-the-art equipment. Spa and Wellness Experience ultimate relaxation and rejuvenation with our luxurious. Our Room Deluxe Suite Experience unparalleled luxury and comfort in our Deluxe Suite at LifeHotel. This spacious and elegantly designed suite features a separate living area, a king-sized bed with premium linens, and a luxurious ensuite bathroom with a deep soaking tub and rainfall shower. The suite is adorned with sophisticated decor and modern amenities, including a large flat-screen TV, high-speed internet, and a fully stocked minibar. Perfect for both business and leisure travelers, the Deluxe Suite offers a perfect blend of style and convenience, ensuring a truly memorable stay. Family Room Our Family Room at LifeHotel is designed to provide the utmost comfort and convenience for families traveling together. This spacious room features two queen-sized beds, a cozy seating area, and ample storage space. The modern bathroom is equipped with a bathtub and child-friendly amenities. The room also includes a flat-screen TV with kid-friendly channels, a mini-fridge, and complimentary Wi-Fi. With thoughtful touches and plenty of space for everyone, the Family Room ensures a comfortable and enjoyable stay for all ages. Executive Room Ideal for business travelers, the Executive Room at LifeHotel combines functionality with comfort. The room is equipped with a large work desk, ergonomic chair, and high-speed internet access, making it easy to stay productive during your stay. The plush king-sized bed, premium linens, and blackout curtains ensure a restful night's sleep. Additional amenities include a flat-screen TV, coffee maker, and a modern bathroom with a walk-in shower. Guests staying in the Executive Room also have access to our business center and executive lounge, offering complimentary refreshments and business services. Honeymoon Suite Celebrate your special moments in the romantic Honeymoon Suite at LifeHotel. This beautifully designed suite features a king-sized canopy bed, a private balcony with stunning views, and a luxurious bathroom with a Jacuzzi tub and walk-in shower. The room is elegantly decorated with romantic touches, such as rose petals, soft lighting, and a complimentary bottle of champagne. The Honeymoon Suite offers an intimate and unforgettable experience, perfect for newlyweds and couples celebrating anniversaries or special occasions. Accessible Room At LifeHotel, we are committed to providing a comfortable stay for all our guests, including those with special needs. Our Accessible Room is thoughtfully designed with wider doorways, lower countertops, and grab bars in the bathroom to ensure ease of movement and safety. The room features a plush queen-sized bed, a comfortable seating area, and modern amenities such as a flat-screen TV and high-speed internet. The bathroom is equipped with a roll-in shower and accessible fixtures. The Accessible Room offers a comfortable and convenient stay for guests with mobility challenges. Also About Room At LifeHotel, we take pride in offering a diverse range of room types to meet the unique needs and preferences of our guests. Each room is meticulously designed with comfort, style, and convenience in mind, ensuring a delightful and memorable stay. Whether you're traveling for business, with family, or seeking a romantic getaway, we have the perfect room for you. Our rooms feature modern amenities, elegant decor, and thoughtful touches to make you feel right at home. Discover the ideal accommodation for your next visit to LifeHotel and enjoy an unparalleled hospitality experience. pages.thanks: Thank You for Choosing LifeHotel | Gratitude from Our Team Thanks for choosing us! We know that you have many choices when it comes to hotels, so we're honored that you've chosen to stay with LifeHotel. We're committed to providing our guests with an exceptional experience, and we're confident that you'll enjoy your stay with us. Our hotel is conveniently located in the heart of the city, so you'll be close to all the best attractions and activities. We offer a variety of room types to choose from, so you can find the perfect one for your needs. And our friendly staff is always happy to help you with anything you need. As you step through our grand entrance, you will be greeted by our warm and professional staff, who are dedicated to making your stay unforgettable. Our reception area is a testament to our commitment to luxury, featuring marble floors, plush seating, and stunning artwork that sets the tone for your stay. Our spacious and elegantly appointed guest rooms are designed to provide the ultimate in comfort and relaxation. Each room is equipped with a king-size bed dressed in the finest linens, a marble bathroom with a rainfall shower and separate bathtub, and a private balcony or patio where you can soak up the stunning views. We believe that dining should be an integral part of your hotel experience, which is why we have curated a selection of exceptional dining options to tantalize your taste buds. Our signature restaurant, L'Epicure, serves exquisite gourmet cuisine crafted by our award-winning chefs. For a more casual dining experience, our poolside bistro offers a menu of light bites and refreshing cocktails. Beyond our guest rooms and restaurants, LifeHotel offers an array of amenities to enhance your stay. Our state-of-the-art fitness center features the latest cardiovascular and weight-training equipment, as well as a dedicated yoga and Pilates studio. Our outdoor swimming pool is the perfect place to cool off and soak up the sun, while our rooftop terrace offers breathtaking panoramic views of the city. For those seeking tranquility and rejuvenation, our spa is a sanctuary of wellness. Our expert therapists provide a range of massage therapies, facials, and body treatments designed to relieve stress and promote relaxation. We are also committed to sustainability and environmental responsibility. Our hotel is LEED-certified, and we have implemented numerous initiatives to reduce our carbon footprint, including energy-efficient lighting, water conservation measures, and a comprehensive recycling program. At LifeHotel, we believe that every guest deserves personalized attention. Our concierge team is available 24/7 to assist you with any requests, from booking excursions to arranging transportation. We are committed to making your stay as seamless and enjoyable as possible. At LifeHotel, we believe in fostering a supportive and inclusive community where everyone feels empowered to pursue their fitness goals without judgment or intimidation. We are confident that you will have an extraordinary experience at LifeHotel. Our dedication to excellence and our unwavering commitment to guest satisfaction will ensure that your stay is truly memorable. We look forward to welcoming you soon. Return to Site
